definition[0]: concerned only with your own small group in society or in an organization, as opposed to being concerned about society or the institution as a whole
example[0]: community groups seeking to protect sectional interests
definition[1]: a sectional drawing or view of something shows what it would look like if it were cut from top to bottom, or from side to side
example[1]: a sectional view of the building
definition[2]: made up of sections that can be put together or taken apart
